ReadmeFileRule.text: VoiceFive, Inc., the parent company of the PremierOpinion software installed on this computer, would like to advise you that we have placed up to 2 files in the system folder(s) of your computer in order to facilitate the operation of our market research software. The names of those files are pmls.dll and/or pmls64.dll. If you have any questions about our files, please contact privacy@voicefive.com
